name: CHASE MANHATTAN BANK v. John NORBERG, Tax Administrator

parties: CHASE MANHATTAN BANK v. John NORBERG, Tax Administrator.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.
MURRAY, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Kathleen Managhan, Corcoran, Peckham & Hayes, Newport, for petitioner.
Perry Shatkin, Chief Legal Counsel for Div. of Taxation, Marcia McGair Ippolito, Legal Counsel for Div. of Taxation, Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
CHASE MANHATTAN BANK v. John NORBERG, Tax Administrator.
No. 85-52-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
May 16, 1985.
Kathleen Managhan, Corcoran, Peckham & Hayes, Newport, for petitioner.
Perry Shatkin, Chief Legal Counsel for Div. of Taxation, Marcia McGair Ippolito, Legal Counsel for Div. of Taxation, Providence, for respondent.
